turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want to make a drink order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can help with that. what did you want to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to get a a grande caramel caramel brulee latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: aw i'm sorry. caramel brulee lattes are a seasonal drink that is not currently being offered. did you want another drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well let me get a Let me get a grande cordusio instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want milk in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, let me get whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. so you said a grande cordusio with whole milk from starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which starbucks should i place this order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the Starbucks on California Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. i'll place the order at the starbucks on california street now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it'll be ready in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think we covered it all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, take care.
